dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model
Class Chc

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.Any
      dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.Chc

public class Chc
extends Any

Handles choice specific features of a DCtxt object. choices consists of multiple nodes: a choice node that has a number of container nodes as children. One of these container nodes is the active container of the choice. The active container is selected via the value of the choice node which must match the name of one of the containers. All non active containers are disabled via the ENABLE attribute.

Navigation

By default when navigating to a choice the active container is selected. Via the method toChoice() the choice node can be selected. With toContainer() the active container can be selected.

Selections

With getAvailableSelections() the names of all available containers of a choice can be queried. getSelection() returns the name of the active container.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.a

Method Detail

to

public DCtxt to()
         throws CtxtException
Navigates the context to corresponding active ContainerDataNode of the referenced choice. If the referenced node is a list of choices the context is moved to the named list element. If the context is a choice nothing happens. In both cases the current context is returned

Overrides:
to in class Any
Returns:
the current context or null on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

getEntries

public java.util.List<DCtxt> getEntries()
                                 throws CtxtException
Fetch all referenced list items. If the context node is a list or the context node is a node in a list all list items are returned. If it is not a list item a new context to the context node is returned. This method always returns the active container of a choice (not the choice node itself).

Overrides:
getEntries in class Any
Returns:
All referenced nodes or null on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
                         throws CtxtException
Get the name of a choice.

If the context-node is a ChoiceDataNode its name is returned. If the context-node is a ListDataNode the name of the first entry is returned if it is a ChoiceDataNode. If the context-node is a ContainerDataNode the name of the enclosing ChoiceDataNode is returned.

Hint: If you want to get the SHORT-NAME of a node, use DCtxt.getShortName() since it might be different from the name, e.g. when the user manually changes the SHORT-NAME via the editor or the SHORT-NAME is changed during an import

Overrides:
getName in class Any
Returns:
The name of the choice that is referenced by the context-node or null
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of error
Since:
2008.a

Hint: If you want to get the SHORT-NAME of a node, use DCtxt.getShortName() since it might be different from the name, e.g. when the user manually changes the SHORT-NAME via the editor or the SHORT-NAME is changed during an import

getAvailableSelections

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAvailableSelections()
                                                        throws CtxtException
Gets all selection to which a choice can be set. If the context-node is a ChoiceDataNode its valid selections are returned. If the context-node is a ListDataNode the valid selections of the first entry are returned if it is a ChoiceDataNode. If the context-node is a ContainerDataNode the valid selections of the enclosing ChoiceDataNode are returned.

Returns:
The selection to which the context choice can be set
Throws:
CtxtException - on error
Since:
2008.a

getSelections

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSelections()
                                               throws CtxtException
Get the names of the selected containers. If the referenced node is a ListDataNode the values of all entries are returned if they are ChoiceDataNodes. If the referenced node is a ChoiceDataNode as a member of a list the values of all entries are returned. If the referenced node is a ContainerDataNode as a selection of a ChoiceDataNode, which is a member of a list the values of all entries are returned.

Returns:
The names of the selected containers of the context choice or null on error
Throws:
CtxtException - on error
Since:
2008.a

setSelection

public boolean setSelection(java.lang.String selection)
                     throws CtxtException
Changes the selected container of the choice. If the current context would get invalid due to a change of the selection, the context is navigated to the new selection.

Parameters:
selection - The name of the container to select
Returns:
false on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

setSelection

public boolean setSelection(int idx,
                            java.lang.String selection)
                     throws CtxtException
Changes the selected container of the choice. If the current context would get invalid due to a change of the selections, the context is navigated to the new selection.

Parameters:
idx - index of the choice to change inside the list (counted from 1)
selection - The name of the container to select
Returns:
false on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

setSelection

public boolean setSelection(java.lang.String path,
                            java.lang.String selection)
                     throws CtxtException
Changes the selected container of the choice. If the current context would get invalid due to a change of the selections, the context is navigated to the new selection.

Parameters:
path - path to a list of choices
selection - The name of the container to select
Returns:
false on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

setSelection

public boolean setSelection(java.lang.String path,
                            int idx,
                            java.lang.String selection)
                     throws CtxtException
Changes the selected container of the choice. Newly created choices are added with a generated name. If the current context would get invalid due to a change of the selections, the context is navigated to the new selection.

Parameters:
path - path to a list of choices
idx - index of the choice to change inside the list (counted from 1)
selection - The name of the container to select
Returns:
false on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

setSelections

public boolean setSelections(IMExpr expr,
                             java.lang.String[] selections)
                      throws CtxtException
Changes the selections of choices returned by an IMExpr. If the current context is a selection of a Choice and would get invalid due to a change of the selections, the context is navigated to the new selection of the parent Choice.

Parameters:
expr - The expression that searches for choices
selections - The new selections
Returns:
false in case of an error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

                    java.lang.String selection)
             throws CtxtException

name - The name of the new choice
selection - The initial selection (may be null)

the newly created choice or null on error

copy

public boolean copy(int toIdx,
                    java.lang.String name)
             throws CtxtException
Copies the given list entry and adds it at the position given by toIdx.

Parameters:
toIdx - The index to add at (counted from 1). Use -1 to add to the end
name - The name of the copied node (null to generate via name pattern)
Returns:
false on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

                    int toIdx,

copy

public boolean copy(java.lang.String path,
                    int idx,
                    int toIdx,
                    java.lang.String name)
             throws CtxtException
Copies the given list entry and adds it at the position given by toIdx.

Parameters:
path - path to the list
idx - index in the list of the item to copy (counted from 1)
toIdx - The index to add at (counted from 1). Use -1 to add to the end
name - The name of the copied node (null to generate via name pattern)
Returns:
false on error
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a

                   throws CtxtException
Get the active container of a choice.

Returns:
A new context that points to the selected container of the choice or null on error
Throws:
CtxtException - on error
Since:
2008.a

getContainer

public DCtxt getContainer(java.lang.String name)
                   throws CtxtException
Get the named container of a choice. Current context must be a choice or a choice container.

Returns:
A new context that points to the selected container of the choice or null on error
Throws:
CtxtException - on error
Since:
2008.a
